tasks.prompt: Read the text and answer the questions.

context.title: My Home
body: I live in a small house with my family.
My house has three rooms: a living room, a kitchen, and a bedroom.
The living room is bright and cozy.
In the living room, there is a blue sofa and a TV on a stand.
There is also a small table and a lamp next to the sofa.
In the kitchen, there is a table and four chairs where I eat breakfast.
There is a fridge, a sink, and a window that looks to the garden.
My bedroom has a big, soft bed and a wardrobe for my clothes.
There is also a small desk where I read or write.
Outside, there is a small garden with flowers and a swing.
We water the flowers in the evening and sit on the swing at the weekend.

tasks.prompt: Listen to this text and answer the questions!

dialogs.speaker: Emma
dialogs.text: Hi, Liam! Thanks for visiting my apartment in the city. It's small but really cozy.

dialogs.speaker: Liam
dialogs.text: Hi, Emma! I love seeing new places. Can you show me the living room first?

dialogs.speaker: Emma
dialogs.text: Sure! The living room has a gray sofa and a big TV. I like to relax here and watch movies after work.

dialogs.speaker: Liam
dialogs.text: It looks comfortable. What about the kitchen?

dialogs.speaker: Emma
dialogs.text: The kitchen is small but very clean. There is a table and two chairs, and I cook breakfast there every morning.

dialogs.speaker: Liam
dialogs.text: Nice! Where do you usually study or work?

dialogs.speaker: Emma
dialogs.text: I study in my bedroom. There's a comfortable bed and a desk where I read in the evening.

dialogs.speaker: Liam
dialogs.text: Do you have a favorite spot in the apartment?

dialogs.speaker: Emma
dialogs.text: Yes, the balcony! It has some flowers and a chair. I like to drink tea there and read a book when the weather is nice.

dialogs.speaker: Liam
dialogs.text: That sounds perfect. Thanks for the tour, Emma!
